resources.string: App Pasos needs access to Health Connect to track your steps, distance, calories, and other health metrics. This data helps us provide personalized insights and track your fitness progress. Your health data is stored securely and never shared without your explicit consent.
Track your daily steps and walking activity
Measure the distance you cover during activities
Monitor calories burned throughout the day
Track your heart rate during activities
Analyze your sleep patterns and quality
Record and view your workout sessions
Store your height for accurate calculations
App Pasos uses activity recognition to automatically detect when you are walking, running, or cycling to accurately track your fitness activities.
